alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Buffalo County through 845 PM CDT... At 817 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Poole to 8 miles east of Riverdale to Kearney. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Buffalo County. This includes Interstate 80 near mile marker 280. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
